title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Thought Markets Were Volatile in the First Half? Watch Out.
items.description: Stocks have rebounded, but the dollar is in a deep slump. Here’s what could go right (and very wrong) for investors.

items.title: Sean Combs trial update: The jury is deliberating over a complex set of charges
items.description: The hip-hop mogul faces an overlapping set of charges that include sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy. The jury resumes deliberations on Tues...

items.title: Ford Foundation’s New Leader Is From Yale Law School
items.description: Heather K. Gerken, the dean of the law school, will run the powerful philanthropy, known for pushing for social justice.

items.title: As light pollution increases, West Texas works to protect the world's largest 'dark sky reserve'
items.description: While recent research shows the night sky is getting brighter every year across North America, the Big Bend area in Texas has fended off the light glo...

items.title: Remembering veteran PBS newscaster Bill Moyers
items.description: Moyers, who died June 26, worked as a special assistant to President Lyndon Johnson before becoming an award-winning journalist and PBS host. Original...

items.title: Differences Over Policy Bill Reignite the Trump-Musk Feud
items.description: President Trump ratcheted up his rhetoric against Elon Musk, at one point suggesting that he could be interested in attempting to deport him.

items.title: Most Americans feel democracy is theatened, poll shows. And, Mamdani speaks with NPR
items.description: A new poll shows that 76% of Americans believe democracy is facing a serious threat. And, Zohran Mamdani sits down with NPR to discuss his run for NYC...

items.title: The U.S. Sends Lots of Plastic Trash Overseas. Malaysia Just Said No Thanks.
items.description: No country receives more discarded plastic from wealthy countries, but shipments from the United States are no longer welcome.

items.title: What’s in the Trump Policy Bill?
items.description: We take a closer look at some less discussed provisions.

items.title: 3 Managers Arrested Over Deaths at U.K. Hospital Where Lucy Letby Worked
items.description: People who were managers when Ms. Letby was convicted of killing babies were arrested on suspicion of manslaughter by gross negligence.

items.title: Top Russian General Convicted in High-Profile Corruption Case
items.description: Timur Ivanov, a longtime deputy defense minister, was sentenced to 13 years in a penal colony, according to the Russian state news agency Tass.

items.title: Israel’s Netanyahu Says He Will Meet With Trump Next Week
items.description: The Israeli prime minister’s expected visit to the United States comes as the cease-fire with Iran may create new momentum for a truce in Gaza.
